mapper.insert: INSERT into company_job (id, company_id, department_id, job_name, job_desc, p_id, create_id, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{companyId}, #{departmentId}, #{jobName}, #{jobDesc}, #{pId}, #{createId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.job_name jobName, a.job_desc jobDesc FROM company_job a WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE company_job
job_name = #{jobName},
job_desc = #{jobDesc},
WHERE id = #{id}
